  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3305</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Why readers have Problems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum Leser Probleme haben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi les lecteurs ont des problèmes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porque os leitores têm problemas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè i lettori hanno problemi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί οι αναγνώστες έχουν τα προβλήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Porqué los programas de lectura tienen 
problemas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG ,discusses why some children are unable to read and how Vowel Pronunciation and Syllable Types relate to Reading</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pronunciation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">syllables</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel, der im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN 
erscheint, behandelt, warum einige Kinder nicht imstande sind zu lesen
und wie Vokal-Aussprache-und Silbe-Typen auf Messwert in Verbindung 
stehen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article qui paraît dans le CHIFFON de 
magazine d'ETNI, discute pourquoi quelques enfants ne peuvent pas lire
et comment les types de prononciation et de syllabe de voyelle 
associent à la lecture</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo que se publica no PANO do 
compartimento de ETNI, discute porque algumas crianças são incapazes
de ler e como os tipos da pronunciação e da sílaba da vogal se 
relacionam à leitura</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo che è publicato nel PANNO dello 
scomparto di ETNI, discute perchè alcuni bambini non possono leggere 
e come i tipi di pronuncia e di sillaba di vocale si riferiscono a 
lettura</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο που εμφανίζεται στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ περιοδικών 
ETNI, συζητά γιατί μερικά παιδιά είναι ανίκανα να διαβάσουν 
και πώς οι τύποι προφοράς και συλλαβών φωνήεντος αφορούν την 
ανάγνωση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo que aparece en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, discute porqué algunos niños no pueden leer 
y cómo los tipos de la pronunciación y de la sílaba de la vocal se 
relacionan con la lectura</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aussprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Silben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
